sense.gloss: vigorously (ripping, tearing, scratching, etc.), roughly, with a rip
with a series of loud, repeated sounds (e.g. firing a machine gun, revving an engine), with a lot of (continuous) noise

sdata.j: ↑太郎↑↓たろう↓のフランス↑語↑↓ご↓は|バリバリ|のカタカナ↑発音↑↓はつおん↓だった。
sdata.e: Taro's strong katakana pronunciation could be heard through his French.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は|バリバリ|の↑仕事↑↓しごと↓の↑鬼↑↓おに↓だ。
sdata.e: He is a glutton for work.
